name: Dice Roll (AdamTheRookie)
description:
You play as a circular dice who dreams to become squared like everybody else! Roll your way through challenging platformer levels with the occasional puzzle! Watch out for square dice though, they kinda hate you...

Use WASD or arrow keys to roll, navigate your way through the levels while avoiding spikes and enemies. You can jump on top of the square dice to deal damage. Killing enmies reduces your time! Try to finsh and fulfill your destiny as fast as possible!

Try beating my time! If you finish the game post it in the comments! (:
